column5: As many of you know I am a service manager and a tech at a Active Green and Ross in Scarborough and am currently looking for a tire installer or apprentice preferably with experiance but I am willing to train the right individual. Thought I would give some OFC'rs first crack at this. if intrested send me a pm or call or drop by the shop I am located a 1530 midland ave 1 block north of lawrence and can be reached at 416-755-2248
This post is important enough to be bumped to the top so... bumpity bump bump!
I just bought new tires fore my ford F150...  maybe i could have got an OFC discount??
How much does it pay?  What kind of benefits?   Why are you looking for help... are you a butthole to work for?
Maybe not tactful, but honest... yes!
I'll take the job for $85,000/year and I have no experience. Do we have a deal?
Hey!! Congratulations Dan Bouck on your new position!!!! Jim
Heck...Ida done it for 85k a year....even if there is no fishing there...well, maybe not without the fishing
